title: 1Bdrm/1Ba Marina Bay-Sunset Views, Upgraded Condo!
posting_body: Waterfront 1/1 Condo, in gated The Shores community.
Beautiful view of Fountain, Pond AND Yacht Harbor views!
Incredible Sunsets and a Resort Lifestyle!
Available September 1st.
Scheduled walk-throughs available in August.
Condo Additional info and amenities included in rent:
-Fully Remodeled- brand new windows installed June 2022!
-Lower level, has no steps to entry.
-New modern kitchen, updated bath with tiled showers & floors.
-Fireplace- recently upgraded with a surround mantle.
-$2,000 high-end closet system upgrade in bedroom- can easily accommodate clothes for 2 people
-In-Unit Washer and Dryer.
-Private patio with pond and marina views
-Ample private storage closet on patio with tankless water heater
-1 Designated Carport Parking
-Ample guest parking
-2 Pools, 2 Hot Tubs, Gym in the Complex
-Location has easy access to 580/80, SF/Oakland/Berkeley/Marin, BART Stations, and a FERRY to San Francisco.
Rental Terms:
-1 year lease required
-First Month's Rent + $2500 Security Deposit
-Price can be adjusted to include ALL utilities if desired (Water, Trash, PG&E + Comcast hi-speed internet w/ in-home modem-router included)
Application Process:
*Recent credit reports with score
*Proof of income, references, rental history & employment required
